text:
Hi, 
After installing the latest LCU on a Windows 10 22H2 Enterprise, I get now in
the control panel:
image.png [cid:ii_lp1ef1lv0]
If I click uninstall, it runs mstsc.exe /uninstall
The CBS log shows that the Microsoft-Windows-TS-OptionalComponents-Package is
removed. 
Question 1 (obvious): how do I added it back.
Question 2: I probably misssed the announcement, where is this (major) change
documented? 
Emin 
--
%40mail.gmail.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Remote Desktop in CPL?
